component.name: Main
component.script:
function init() appInfo = CreateObject("roAppInfo") m.top.setFocus(true)
m.appTitle = m.top.findNode("appTitle") m.appVersion = m.top.findNode("appVersion") m.appDevId = m.top.findNode("appDevId")
m.appTitle.text = "Title: " + appInfo.GetTitle() m.appTitle.color = "0x000000"
m.appVersion.text = "Version: " + appInfo.GetVersion() m.appVersion.color = "0x000000"
m.appDevId.text = "Development ID: " + appInfo.GetDevID() m.appDevId.color = "0x000000" end function
